text: Risa Nishioka is a basketball player from Japan. Nishioka competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Risa NISHIOKA She was born on 3 March 1997.Risa Nishioka == References == Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:Japanese basketball players Category:Olympians for Japan Category:People from Nara Prefecture
title: Risa Nishioka
